name: Oricorio
author: Oswaldo KATO
flavor_text: This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon becomes fiercely angry.

abilities.name: Lesson in Zeal
abilities.effect: All of your Fusion Strike Pokémon take 20 less damage from attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can’t apply more than 1 Lesson in Zeal Ability at a time.

attacks.name: Glistening Droplets
attacks.effect: Put 5 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.
